question: You enjoyed a holiday organized by a tour company. Write a letter to the manager and praise the tour guide who accompanied you on the journey.In your letter, you should:•	describe the details of your holiday•	explain what the tour guide did that was helpful•	suggest how the manager may reward the tour guide.
text: I am writing this letter to let you know about  the impeccable service provided by your tour guide. I took part in a holiday tour to Scotland organized by your company in the last week.

Firstly, I would like to let you know that I enjoyed the trip and planning to enrol for the other trip in future. Also, I liked the service provided by your tour guide while on the trip. Since I was new to this place and I had an injury he took additional care and helped me in all aspects including accommodation, shopping and helping  with the best local food. The way he explains the  history of the tourist spots attracts the people. I wish to give him a top rating.
In addition to that, could you please recommend your company to reward him with goodies and awards?.
